Audio.Author: Diego Calderon-F.
Audio.Comments: call notes from Colombian W Andes chrysops ssp.I used to get this one mistakenly IDed as [Zimmerius albigularis - Choco Tyrannulet](http://www.flickr.com/search/?w=27992517@N08&q=zimmerius%20montezuma)bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
